products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, thunderbird - vertical blind the roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all
products.productdescription: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one! This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make! Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop. Or use as a colourful feature in a plain hallway, landing, or utility room.

products.title: Lux Thunder Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Lux Dark Thunder Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, the vanes will block the light entering your room when closed.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Legacy Thunder
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure legacy thunder standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
